title: Where are the ISA exam halls in gjb??
content: I got GJB AC n07 for ISAs, I have no idea where that is could someone tell at least what floor it's on in gjb üôè

comments.body: It's right opposite pes52. Walk straight in from the entrance, as walk, u will see a huge crowd at GJB. Follow em.

Did u not have a mock exam?  anyway not from rr so don't remember the exact floor, all i remember from writing Pessat is that it was on the floor from where u could look down from the corridor and see all the indoor basketball courts.   
u can just go to GJBC and ask someone to point it out for you.
what is pes 52?

Go through the side entrance of gjb the one in front of oat there will be a staircase towards the right 
We go up there and that whole area is jags nest you will see room labelled as n01 n02 and so on 
They have a map for the rooms as well
inside jag's nest
The room above cafe coffee day where most of the hackathons happen
Pes52 is the hackathon center. Bro have u explored the campus beyond f block ? üôÉ
i have been there multiple times but it was empty
oh thanks
How do I get to know which exam hall I'm in
Oh is it the same place where we wrote PESSAT?? Also btw we had mocks but they were online so I took them from home lol
Go PESU app on mobile, it's there under "Seating Info"
Thanks, these directions are exactly what I wanted
follow the crowd near pesu52. Got it ü´°
Lol exactly,  this worked for me at-least for few times when i don‚Äôt know where exactly the room is :)
This strat helped me a lot in bootstrap too, guess the hivemind is never wrong
Lol
yup same place as pessat.
Alright, then I know where it is, thanks!
Enter through main gates (right in front of the ampitheatre), turn right, climb the stairs. Immediate right you'll see the map on the wall.
